word_group.brief_definition: 最近离婚；最近刚刚离婚；刚刚离婚
离婚男性；离婚男子；离异男子
一个最近离婚的；一个刚刚离婚的；一个离婚没多久的
最近离婚了的妈妈；刚离婚的妈妈；刚单身的母亲

bilingual.source: He felt relieved after he got divorced.
bilingual.target: 他在离婚后感到如释重负。

bilingual.source: She is divorced and raising her children alone.
bilingual.target: 她离婚了，独自抚养孩子。

bilingual.source: He divorced her because she turned into a shrew.
bilingual.target: 他和她离婚了，因为她变成了一个泼妇。

bilingual.source: Being divorced can be a challenging experience for anyone.
bilingual.target: 离婚对任何人来说都是一种挑战性的经历。

bilingual.source: They decided to get divorced after years of trying to make it work.
bilingual.target: 在多年努力维持婚姻后，他们决定离婚。

bilingual.source: Many people find it hard to start dating again after getting divorced.
bilingual.target: 许多人在离婚后发现很难重新开始约会。

bilingual.source: Divorced persons are viewed with some disapproval.
bilingual.target: 大家对离婚的人有些不满。

bilingual.source: Divorced persons may remarry, but a gender prejudice shows up.
bilingual.target: 离婚的人可以再婚，但会出现性别偏见。

bilingual.source: My best friend Petra is getting divorced.
bilingual.target: 我最好的朋友佩特拉要离婚了。

bilingual.source: He's been depressed ever since he got divorced.
bilingual.target: 自从离婚后，他一直很沮丧。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you trying to get everybody divorced?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要害每个人都离婚吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't know you and Kara divorced. I'm sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道你跟卡拉离婚了，我很遗憾。

yingyinNormal.en: This series of milestones. Getting married. Having kids. Getting divorced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一个个的里程碑，结婚，生子，离婚。

yingyinNormal.en: No-no, that's not my thing. I do not love getting divorced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那才不是我的标记，我并不爱离婚。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no. You guys aren't supposed to get divorced for seven years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，不，你们七年之内不可以离婚的。

yingyinNormal.en: So they got divorced and Dale moved in. Tired. Go to sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以他们离婚了，然后戴尔就搬了进来。我累了，去睡吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe I should open a divorced men's club. Dude that is so sad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许我该成立一个离婚男子俱乐部。兄弟，那太惨了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, you're not gonna tell the whole story about how your parents got divorced again, are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你又要说你爸妈离婚的事了？

yingyinNormal.en: When my parents got divorced is when I started using humor as a defense mechanism.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我父母离婚后，我开始用幽默来自卫。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry. When my parents were getting divorced, I got a lot of tigers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很抱歉，我父母在闹离婚时，很多人叫我“老虎”。

yingyinNormal.en: What? You're thing. You're thing. You know? You're the guy who gets divorced. Oh yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？你的标记，你是专门离婚的人，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Getting divorced again. Getting my master's degree. Finally getting the job I wanted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再次离婚，获得硕士学位，总算找到心仪的工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, divorced men are not bad men. They have that on the napkins at the club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离婚男人不是坏男人。他们把那句话印在俱乐部的纸巾上。

yingyinNormal.en: He is. But he's getting divorced. Ross. Maybe you know him. It's not a club.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，但他正在办离婚，罗斯，或许你认识他。这又不是俱乐部。

yingyinNormal.en: So what? Look, okay, suppose we were a divorced couple. And I got custody of the kid, right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那又怎样？听着，假设我们是离婚夫妻，我取得孩子的监护权。

yingyinNormal.en: You can lose your money there. You can get married. You can get divorced. You can go in there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 赌博的好去处。你可以在这结婚 ，离婚。或者是进去风流一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Just a sandwich? Look, I am 30 years old, okay? I'm gonna be divorced twice and I just got evicted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过是个三明治？我今年30岁，已经离婚两次，还没地方可住。

yingyinNormal.en: Recently divorced doctor with a ginger cat a barn conversion and a history of erectile dysfunction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近刚离婚的医生，有一只姜黄色的猫，有一处改建房，曾经阳痿。

yingyinNormal.en: Does it matter? You're ultimately just gonna die or get divorced or have to blow your pets head off. Aghh. Me too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有关系吗？你始终都会死，或离婚，或枪杀你的宠物。我也是。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I was with Carol for four years before we got married and I wound up divorced from a pregnant lesbian.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，我跟卡萝结婚前在一起4年，最后跟一个怀孕的女同志离婚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 离婚的；脱离的；不相干的

word_family.mean: n. 离婚；分离；分开；离婚判决

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Divorced</highlight> persons may remarry, but a gender prejudice shows up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离婚的人可以再婚，但性别歧视会显现出来。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>divorced</highlight> male doesn't have a waiting period before he can remarry while the woman must wait ten months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离异的男性无需等待一定的时间就可以再婚，但女性则必须等待10个月才可以再婚。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Divorced</highlight> persons are viewed with some disapproval.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对离婚的人有些不以为然。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 离婚的；脱离的；不相干的

word_family.mean: n. 离婚；分离；分开；离婚判决

examination_example.sentence: So Frankie in both real life and in the TV show lives in New York City, is a comic and is <highlight>divorced</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，现实生活和电视剧中的弗兰基都住在纽约，是一名喜剧演员，并且已经离婚。
